member.name: MFNetAuthenticationFlags
member.summary: Specifies how the user's credentials will be used.

member.name: MFNetAuthenticationFlags.MFNET_AUTHENTICATION_PROXY
member.summary: The credentials will be used to authenticate with a proxy.

member.name: MFNetAuthenticationFlags.MFNET_AUTHENTICATION_CLEAR_TEXT
member.summary: The credentials will be sent over the network unencrypted.

member.name: MFNetAuthenticationFlags.MFNET_AUTHENTICATION_LOGGED_ON_USER
member.summary: The credentials must be from a user who is currently logged on.
